title: Carney meets China’s Xi after eight years, but deal remains elusive
body: Canada’s Prime Minister Mark Carney met with Chinese President Xi Jinping on Friday, marking the first time leaders from both countries have sat down for official talks in eight years. The meeting happened during the Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation summit taking place in South Korea. Carney told reporters on Saturday that people shouldn’t expect quick fixes to come out of one conversation. He said the goal was simply to start talking again at the top level after such a long break. “What the meeting accomplished, which was the objective of the meeting, was to establish that relationship at the highest level for the first time in eight years, and to unlock a few things,” Carney said before heading back home. The prime minister accepted an invitation from Xi to travel to China sometime in the new year. However, he wouldn’t say when problems like tariffs and travel limits between the two countries might get sorted out. “People sometimes simplify it down, to give this for that,” Carney said . “That’s not the way it works.” One major issue between Canada and China involves taxes placed on each other’s products. Last year, when Justin Trudeau was still prime minister, Canada put heavy tariffs on electric vehicles, steel and aluminum coming from China. In response, China placed levies on Canadian food products, hitting canola especially hard as reported by Cryptopolitan. This crop represents a major export for Canadian farmers selling to Asia. Carney said he wants to open doors for more Canadian companies to do business in China over time. He mentioned clothing retailers like Lululemon Athletica Inc. and Canada Goose Holdings Inc. as examples of businesses that could benefit. He noted that some sectors involving cyber-security technology would likely still face investment restrictions due to security concerns. Walking a careful line on electric vehicles When reporters asked if Canada would reconsider the 100% tariff it placed on Chinese electric vehicles, Carney didn’t give a clear answer. He said his government would “proceed carefully” because of challenges facing the auto industry, likely referring to tariffs that US President Donald Trump has put on Canadian cars coming into America. Still, Carney sees room for Canada and China to work together on clean energy projects. He pointed out that Chinese companies lead the world in offshore wind power and battery storage technology. “Some of the most competitive companies in the world are Chinese, in both offshore wind and in battery storage,” Carney said. “It’s a natural potential area for cooperation even before you get to EVs.” Trouble with America complicates matters Meanwhile, Canada faces trade troubles closer to home. Last week, President Trump said he was ending trade discussions with Canada. This came after Ontario released an advertisement using audio from former President Ronald Reagan criticizing tariffs. After speaking with Mark Carney, Ontario Premier Doug Ford paused the advertising campaign on Monday to allow trade talks with the United States to resume. The ad continued to air during the World Series games over the weekend before the pause took effect. “Our intention was always to initiate a conversation about the kind of economy that Americans want to build and the impact of tariffs on workers and businesses,” Ford said. “We’ve achieved our goal, having reached U.S. audiences at the highest levels.” Sharpen your strategy with mentorship + daily ideas - 30 days free access to our trading program

title: Bitcoin Cash Price Prediction: Decoding BCH’s Explosive Future to $1000
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Cash Price Prediction: Decoding BCH’s Explosive Future to $1000 Are you looking at the charts, wondering if Bitcoin Cash (BCH) still has the potential to deliver significant gains? The world of digital assets is dynamic, and few cryptocurrencies spark as much debate and interest as Bitcoin Cash. Today, we’re diving deep into the Bitcoin Cash Price Prediction for the coming years, exploring the factors that could drive its value and answering the burning question: Will BCH hit the coveted $1000 mark by 2030? Many investors are seeking clarity amidst market volatility. Understanding the potential trajectory of BCH requires a look at its fundamentals, market sentiment, and broader economic trends. This comprehensive guide will equip you with insights into what the future might hold for this prominent cryptocurrency. Understanding Bitcoin Cash: A Brief Overview Bitcoin Cash (BCH) emerged in 2017 as a hard fork of Bitcoin, born from a desire to address Bitcoin’s scalability limitations. Its core philosophy revolves around providing a peer-to-peer electronic cash system that offers fast, reliable, and low-cost transactions. By increasing the block size limit, BCH aimed to process more transactions per second, making it more suitable for everyday payments. Key aspects of Bitcoin Cash: Larger Block Size: Originally 8MB, later increased to 32MB, allowing for more transactions per block compared to Bitcoin’s 1MB. Lower Transaction Fees: Designed to keep transaction costs minimal, making it practical for small purchases. Faster Confirmation Times: Aims for quicker transaction processing, enhancing user experience. Decentralized Vision: Adheres to the original Bitcoin whitepaper’s vision of electronic cash. This commitment to utility and accessibility forms the bedrock of any future BCH price movement. Historical Performance: What Can We Learn from the Past? BCH’s journey has been a rollercoaster. After its launch, it quickly gained significant value, reflecting the strong belief in its mission. However, like many altcoins, it has experienced substantial price fluctuations, often correlated with the broader cryptocurrency market, especially Bitcoin’s movements. Its all-time high in late 2017/early 2018 showed the market’s initial enthusiasm, while subsequent bear markets tested its resilience. Analyzing historical data helps us understand market cycles and investor behavior, providing context for our Bitcoin Cash Price Prediction . While past performance is not indicative of future results, it highlights BCH’s ability to recover and attract renewed interest during bull cycles. Factors Influencing Bitcoin Cash’s Future Price Several critical elements will shape the Bitcoin Cash future . These factors are interconnected and can cause significant shifts in market sentiment and price action. 1. Market Dynamics and Bitcoin’s Influence The cryptocurrency market often moves in tandem with Bitcoin (BTC). As a major altcoin, BCH is particularly sensitive to BTC’s price movements. A strong Bitcoin bull run typically pulls altcoins, including BCH, upwards. Conversely, a BTC correction can lead to broader market downturns. Macroeconomic factors, such as interest rates, inflation, and global economic stability, also play a significant role in overall crypto market sentiment. 2. Technological Developments and Network Upgrades The ongoing development and improvement of the Bitcoin Cash network are vital. Features like Schnorr signatures, which enhance privacy and transaction efficiency, and continued efforts to improve scalability and smart contract capabilities, can boost adoption and investor confidence. A robust and evolving ecosystem is crucial for long-term growth. 3. Adoption and Utility For BCH to truly thrive, widespread adoption as a payment method is essential. This includes integration with payment processors, acceptance by merchants, and increased usage for remittances and daily transactions. Partnerships with businesses and developers building on the BCH blockchain will drive real-world utility, strengthening its value proposition. 4. Halving Events Like Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash undergoes halving events, which reduce the reward for mining new blocks by half. These events decrease the supply of new BCH entering the market, and historically, they have often preceded significant price increases due to scarcity. The next BCH halving is a key event to watch for. 5. Regulatory Environment The global regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies is constantly evolving. Clear and favorable regulations can provide certainty for institutional investors and foster broader adoption. Conversely, restrictive or uncertain regulations can hinder growth and create market apprehension. Decoding the Bitcoin Cash Price Prediction for 2025 As we look towards 2025, several market analysts anticipate a potential resurgence in the broader crypto market. Following a period of consolidation, many expect renewed investor interest and capital inflow. For BCH, 2025 could be a year of steady recovery and foundational growth. Our Bitcoin Cash Price Prediction for 2025 suggests a conservative yet optimistic outlook. If the overall market experiences a healthy recovery, driven by favorable macroeconomic conditions and increased institutional adoption of cryptocurrencies, BCH is likely to benefit. The focus on utility and low fees might attract users looking for practical digital payment solutions. Minimum Price: Around $250 – $300 Average Price: Around $350 – $450 Maximum Price: Potentially reaching $500 – $600 if market sentiment is exceptionally strong. The key here will be sustained development within the BCH ecosystem and its ability to maintain relevance in a competitive landscape. This period will be crucial in setting the stage for the long-term Bitcoin Cash future . Analyzing the BCH Price Trajectory Towards 2026 Moving into 2026, the market might be experiencing the effects of the previous year’s growth. This year could see BCH consolidating its gains or continuing an upward trend, depending on the momentum of the wider crypto bull cycle. The impact of the BCH halving event, if it occurs around this time, could start to be fully realized, leading to increased scarcity and potential price appreciation. For our BCH price forecast in 2026, we consider a scenario where Bitcoin and the overall market continue their upward trajectory, but perhaps at a more measured pace. Utility-driven coins like BCH could see sustained interest as more people use cryptocurrencies for everyday transactions. A possible range for 2026: Metric 2026 Price Range Low $400 – $500 Average $550 – $700 High $750 – $850 Continued adoption by merchants and payment gateways will be a significant catalyst during this period. The narrative of BCH as a practical, transactional cryptocurrency could gain further traction. Bitcoin Cash’s Long-Term Outlook: A 2027-2029 Forecast The years between 2027 and 2029 represent a crucial phase for any long-term BCH forecast . By this time, the cryptocurrency market is expected to have matured considerably, with clearer regulatory frameworks and potentially wider mainstream adoption. Bitcoin Cash’s ability to innovate and adapt will be paramount. During these years, we might see BCH solidifying its position as a go-to cryptocurrency for fast, cheap payments, especially in regions where traditional banking infrastructure is less developed or more expensive. The competition will be fierce, but BCH’s established network and community could provide a competitive edge. Key considerations for this period: Technological Superiority: Does BCH continue to offer competitive transaction speeds and costs compared to newer alternatives? Ecosystem Growth: Are there thriving dApps, services, and wallets built around BCH? Market Cycles: The crypto market is cyclical. These years could encompass both bullish and bearish phases, influencing price action. If BCH maintains its developmental pace and expands its utility, the price could see substantial appreciation, building towards our ultimate target. Will Bitcoin Cash Hit $1000? A 2030 Cryptocurrency Price Prediction This is the question on everyone’s mind. Can Bitcoin Cash truly reach $1000 by 2030? Our long-term Cryptocurrency price prediction suggests that it is indeed a plausible, though ambitious, target. Achieving this milestone would require a confluence of favorable factors: Scenario for BCH to Reach $1000: Sustained Crypto Bull Market: A robust, multi-year bull market that sees Bitcoin reaching new all-time highs would likely pull BCH along. Increased Global Adoption: Widespread acceptance of cryptocurrencies for payments, particularly BCH’s niche as a fast and cheap option. This means more merchants, more users, and more integration into daily financial lives. Technological Advancements: Continuous improvements in scalability, security, and smart contract functionality that keep BCH competitive and relevant. Favorable Regulatory Environment: Clear and supportive regulations worldwide that encourage rather than stifle innovation and adoption. Reduced Competition or Niche Dominance: BCH carving out a dominant position in specific payment sectors or regions. If these conditions align, reaching $1000 by 2030 becomes a realistic possibility. The market capitalization would still be significantly lower than Bitcoin’s, leaving room for substantial growth if its utility narrative takes hold globally. 2030 Price Projection for BCH: Minimum Price: $700 – $850 (assuming steady growth) Average Price: $900 – $1200 (if market conditions are favorable) Maximum Price: Potentially $1500+ (in an exceptionally strong bull market with high adoption) It’s important to remember that these are predictions based on current trends and expert analysis. The crypto market is highly volatile, and unforeseen events can always impact prices. Challenges and Risks for Bitcoin Cash While the potential is there, BCH faces several challenges that could impact its journey to $1000: Competition: The payment coin sector is crowded with established players and emerging technologies. Ethereum’s scaling solutions, Solana, Litecoin, and even newer stablecoins offer alternatives. Developer Activity: Maintaining a vibrant developer community is crucial for continuous innovation and network security. Market Volatility: Cryptocurrencies are inherently volatile. Sudden market crashes or shifts in sentiment can erase gains quickly. Regulatory Headwinds: Unfavorable regulations in key markets could hinder adoption and development. Internal Divisiveness: Past hard forks (like the creation of Bitcoin SV) highlight the potential for community splits, which can damage investor confidence. Investors must consider these risks when evaluating the long-term prospects of BCH. Opportunities for BCH Growth Despite the challenges, several opportunities could propel Bitcoin Cash forward: Global Remittances: BCH’s low fees and fast transactions make it ideal for international money transfers, especially to developing nations. Micropayments: Its design is well-suited for small, frequent transactions, potentially opening doors in content monetization and online gaming. Merchant Adoption: Focusing on easy-to-integrate payment solutions for businesses could significantly increase its utility. Decentralized Finance (DeFi) Expansion: While not its primary focus, increased interoperability or specific DeFi applications on BCH could broaden its appeal. Leveraging these opportunities will be key to unlocking BCH’s full potential. Expert Opinions and Analyst Insights Many analysts hold varied views on BCH’s future. Some remain bullish, citing its foundational principles of cheap and fast transactions as a timeless value proposition in a world moving towards digital payments. They often point to its established network effect and brand recognition as advantages. Others are more cautious, highlighting the intense competition and the need for BCH to continuously innovate to stay relevant. However, a common thread among optimistic projections is the belief that if the overall cryptocurrency market continues its growth trajectory and real-world utility becomes a dominant narrative, BCH is well-positioned to capture a significant share of the transactional volume. How to Approach BCH Investment: Actionable Insights Investing in any cryptocurrency, including Bitcoin Cash, requires a thoughtful approach. Here are some actionable insights: Do Your Own Research (DYOR): Never invest based solely on predictions. Understand BCH’s technology, use cases, and community. Risk Management: Only invest what you can afford to lose. The crypto market is volatile. Diversification: Don’t put all your eggs in one basket. Spread your investments across different assets. Long-Term Perspective: Cryptocurrency investments often yield the best results over longer time horizons, weathering short-term fluctuations. Stay Informed: Keep up-to-date with market news, technological developments, and regulatory changes affecting BCH. Frequently Asked Questions About Bitcoin Cash What is Bitcoin Cash (BCH)? Bitcoin Cash (BCH) is a cryptocurrency that was created in 2017 as a hard fork of Bitcoin. Its primary goal is to serve as a peer-to-peer electronic cash system, offering faster and cheaper transactions than Bitcoin by using a larger block size. Who created Bitcoin Cash? Bitcoin Cash was created by a group of developers and miners who advocated for a larger block size to improve scalability. Notable figures associated with its early development and promotion include Roger Ver and Jihan Wu , co-founder of Bitmain. What is the difference between Bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash? The main difference lies in their block size and philosophy. Bitcoin (BTC) maintains a 1MB block size, prioritizing decentralization and security, often seen as ‘digital gold.’ Bitcoin Cash (BCH) increased its block size (currently 32MB) to prioritize faster and cheaper transactions, aiming to be a medium of exchange for everyday use. Is BCH a good investment for the long term? Whether BCH is a ‘good’ investment depends on your personal financial goals and risk tolerance. It has strong fundamentals for payments and a dedicated community. However, it faces significant competition and market volatility. Researching its utility, adoption rates, and future development plans is crucial. Where can I buy Bitcoin Cash (BCH)? Bitcoin Cash is widely available on most major cryptocurrency exchanges. Popular platforms where you can buy BCH include Binance , Coinbase , Kraken , and Bitcoin.com ‘s own exchange. Conclusion: The Path to $1000 for BCH The journey for Bitcoin Cash to reach $1000 by 2030 is undoubtedly ambitious, but it is not beyond the realm of possibility. Its foundational commitment to being a fast, low-cost digital cash system provides a strong use case in a world increasingly moving towards digital transactions. While challenges such as market competition and volatility are ever-present, continued technological development, increasing global adoption, and favorable market cycles could converge to propel BCH to significant new heights. As with all cryptocurrency investments, thorough research and a clear understanding of risks are paramount. The future of Bitcoin Cash, like the broader crypto market, remains an exciting and unpredictable frontier, but its potential for substantial growth in the coming years is certainly worth watching. title: Meta moves to dismiss 'meager, uncoordinated' adult content piracy lawsuit
body: Meta Platforms has asked a United States court to dismiss a lawsuit that accused the company of illegally downloading and distributing thousands of adult contents to train its artificial intelligence systems. Filed in the US District Court for the Northern District of California, the motion to dismiss argues that there is no evidence to support these claims. In its filing, Meta claims that there is no evidence pointing to the fact that its models contain or were trained using copyrighted materials. The company also claimed that the allegations are “nonsensical and unsupported.” The motion was first reported by Ars Technica, with Meta issuing a direct denial, noting that the claims are bogus. Plaintiffs have gone “to great lengths to stitch this narrative together with guesswork and innuendo, but their claims are neither cogent nor supported by well-pleaded facts,” the motion reads. Meta wants the court to dismiss adult content piracy lawsuit The original complaint was filed in July by Strike 3 Holdings. The platform alleged that Meta used corporate and concealed IP addresses to torrent nearly 2,400 adult movies since 2018. It claimed that the move was part of the company’s broader efforts to build multimodal artificial intelligence systems. Strike 3 is an adult film holding base in Miami, distributing content under brands like Vixen, Tushy, and Blacked, among others. In its motion , Meta argues that the scale and pattern of alleged downloads contradict Strike 3’s AI training theory. Over the past seven years, only 157 adult contents produced by Strike were allegedly downloaded using Meta’s corporate IP addresses. This puts it at an average of around 22 downloads per year across 47 different IP addresses. Angela Dunning, Meta’s attorney, characterized the lawsuit as “meager, uncoordinated activity” from “disparate individuals.” Dunning attributed the downloads to individuals, noting that they were for personal use, and not part of an effort by the tech giant to gather data for AI training as Strike 3 alleges. The motion also pushes back on Strike 3’s claims that Meta used more than 2,500 hidden third-party IP addresses, noting that Strike 3 did not verify the addresses and instead made loose correlations. It claimed that one of the IP ranges is allegedly connected to a Hawaiian nonprofit with no link to Meta, while others have no identified owner. Meta also claimed that there is no proof that it knew about the alleged downloads, and neither is there proof that it could have stopped them. It also added that it gained nothing from them and that monitoring every file on its global network would be neither simple nor required by law. Dermot McGrath, co-founder of venture capital firm Ryzen Labs, said, “If Meta admitted the data was used in models, they’d have to argue fair use, justify the inclusion of pirated content, and open themselves to discovery of their internal training and audit systems.” He also added that instead of denying how the data was used, Meta has chosen to deny that it ever used it at all. However, McGrath claims that if the court admits the defense, it could open “a massive loophole.” He claims that it could “effectively undermine copyright protection for AI training data cases” such that future cases would need “stronger evidence of corporate direction, which companies would simply get better at hiding.” Still, there are legitimate reasons to use explicit content, with some companies using it to develop safety or moderation tools. “Most major AI companies have ‘red teams’ whose job is to probe models for weaknesses by using harmful prompts and trying to get the AI to generate explicit, dangerous, or prohibited content,” McGrath said. title: XRP Price Prediction: Unlocking the Future Potential – Will Ripple XRP Surge to $5 by 2030?
body: BitcoinWorld XRP Price Prediction: Unlocking the Future Potential – Will Ripple XRP Surge to $5 by 2030? The cryptocurrency world is constantly evolving, and few digital assets have captured as much attention and debate as Ripple XRP. Its journey has been a rollercoaster, marked by groundbreaking innovation, strategic partnerships, and significant legal challenges. But the burning question on everyone’s mind remains: what does the future hold for XRP price prediction , especially regarding the elusive $5 mark? For years, XRP has been a cornerstone in the digital asset space, aiming to revolutionize cross-border payments. Its unique position and the ongoing developments surrounding its ecosystem make it a fascinating subject for investors and enthusiasts alike. This comprehensive article delves into the potential trajectory of XRP, exploring the factors that could drive its value, the hurdles it faces, and whether reaching $5 is a realistic target. Understanding Ripple XRP: More Than Just a Digital Asset Before we dive into future price movements, it is essential to understand what Ripple XRP truly is. XRP is the native cryptocurrency of the XRP Ledger (XRPL), an open-source, decentralized blockchain technology. Developed by Jed McCaleb, David Schwartz, and Arthur Britto, the XRPL was designed for fast, low-cost, and reliable transactions, primarily focusing on cross-border payments. Ripple, the company, utilizes XRP in its payment solutions, such as RippleNet, which connects banks and financial institutions globally. The core benefit of XRP lies in its efficiency: transactions on the XRPL can settle in mere seconds, at a fraction of the cost of traditional banking systems or even other cryptocurrencies. This utility has positioned XRP as a potential disruptor in the remittance and global payments industry. Key Aspects of Ripple XRP: Speed: Transactions settle in 3-5 seconds. Cost: Extremely low transaction fees, typically less than a cent. Scalability: Capable of handling 1,500 transactions per second (TPS), with potential for more. Decentralization: The XRP Ledger is maintained by a network of independent validators. Utility: Used for international money transfers, liquidity on demand, and micro-payments. Navigating the Legal Landscape: The SEC vs. Ripple Saga and its Impact on XRP Forecast No discussion about XRP’s future is complete without addressing the elephant in the room: the lawsuit filed by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) against Ripple Labs. In December 2020, the SEC alleged that Ripple conducted an unregistered securities offering by selling XRP. This legal battle has cast a long shadow over XRP, leading to its delisting from several major U.S. exchanges and significantly impacting its price. However, recent developments have provided a glimmer of hope. A landmark ruling in July 2023 declared that programmatic sales of XRP on exchanges did not constitute an investment contract, marking a partial victory for Ripple. This decision brought much-needed regulatory clarity, leading to a substantial price surge and renewed optimism for the XRP forecast . Impact of the SEC Lawsuit: Initial Price Drop: Significant decline in XRP’s value post-lawsuit announcement. Delistings: Many U.S. exchanges halted XRP trading for their customers. Regulatory Clarity: Recent court decisions have provided more certainty, attracting institutional interest. Market Sentiment: The legal developments heavily influenced investor confidence and market perception. Factors Influencing the XRP Price Prediction 2025 and Beyond Predicting the price of any cryptocurrency is inherently complex, given the volatile nature of the market. However, several key factors will play a crucial role in shaping the XRP price prediction in the coming years: 1. Regulatory Clarity and Global Adoption: The resolution of the SEC lawsuit, or at least continued positive developments, is paramount. Clear regulations can pave the way for wider institutional adoption and relisting on U.S. exchanges. Beyond the U.S., increasing acceptance by financial institutions and governments for cross-border payments using RippleNet will be a major catalyst. 2. Market Sentiment and Broader Crypto Trends: The overall health of the cryptocurrency market significantly impacts individual assets. A bullish market, potentially driven by Bitcoin halvings or broader economic recovery, would likely pull XRP’s price upwards. Conversely, a bear market could exert downward pressure. 3. Ripple’s Partnerships and Use Cases: Ripple continues to forge partnerships globally. The expansion of RippleNet, especially in emerging markets, and the potential for XRP to be used in Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs) or other innovative financial products, could substantially increase its utility and demand. 4. Technological Advancements on the XRP Ledger: Ongoing development and upgrades to the XRPL, such as new features, smart contract capabilities, or enhanced scalability, can attract more developers and projects, boosting the ecosystem and demand for XRP. 5. Macroeconomic Factors: Global economic conditions, inflation rates, interest rates, and geopolitical events can all influence investor appetite for risk assets like cryptocurrencies. XRP Price Prediction 2025: A Look at the Near Future As we approach 2025, the market will likely have absorbed more of the implications from the SEC lawsuit. Assuming a continued positive regulatory environment and a generally recovering crypto market, the XRP price prediction for 2025 holds significant interest. Potential Scenarios for XRP in 2025: Scenario Low Price Target Average Price Target High Price Target Optimistic (Strong Adoption, Bull Market) $1.20 $1.80 $2.50+ Moderate (Steady Growth, Market Recovery) $0.70 $1.00 $1.50 Pessimistic (Regulatory Setbacks, Bear Market) $0.40 $0.55 $0.70 An optimistic outlook for 2025 suggests that with clearer regulations and increased utility, XRP could regain its momentum. Institutional investors, previously hesitant due to legal uncertainties, might enter the market, driving demand. However, any unexpected negative regulatory news or a broader crypto market downturn could temper these predictions. XRP Price Prediction 2026-2030: Can Ripple XRP Truly Soar? Looking further into the future, the long-term XRP price prediction depends heavily on Ripple’s ability to execute its vision for global payments and the broader evolution of the digital asset landscape. If Ripple successfully integrates XRP into mainstream financial systems, its utility could drive significant value appreciation. Long-Term Drivers for Ripple XRP: Cross-Border Payments Dominance: If RippleNet becomes a standard for international remittances, XRP’s demand as a bridge currency will skyrocket. CBDC Integration: Ripple is actively working with central banks on CBDC solutions. If XRP plays a role in these systems, its value proposition would be immense. Decentralized Finance (DeFi) on XRPL: Growth of DeFi applications and smart contracts on the XRP Ledger could create new use cases and demand. Tokenization of Assets: The XRPL’s efficiency makes it suitable for tokenizing various assets, potentially expanding its ecosystem. By 2030, if Ripple achieves significant milestones in these areas and the crypto market matures with clearer global regulations, XRP could see substantial growth. However, competition from other blockchain networks and traditional financial systems remains a challenge. Can XRP Reach $5? Unpacking the “XRP to $5” Scenario The question of whether XRP to $5 is achievable is perhaps the most debated topic among its holders. To reach $5, XRP would need a market capitalization significantly higher than its current levels. Let’s consider what this would entail: What Would it Take for XRP to Reach $5? Massive Institutional Adoption: Widespread use by major banks and financial institutions for large-scale transactions. Complete Regulatory Clarity: A definitive global framework that recognizes XRP’s utility and not as a security. Dominance in Cross-Border Payments: Capturing a significant share of the multi-trillion-dollar global remittance market. Strong Bull Market: A sustained period of growth across the entire cryptocurrency market, similar to the 2017 or 2021 bull runs. High Utility and Demand: Consistent and growing demand for XRP from various use cases beyond just speculation. Currently, XRP’s all-time high is around $3.84, achieved during the 2017-2018 bull run. Reaching $5 would mean surpassing this peak, which is certainly possible with the right catalysts. The market cap at $5 would place XRP among the top cryptocurrencies, indicating a high level of trust and utility. While ambitious, it is not an impossible target, especially considering the potential for exponential growth in the digital asset space. Expert Insights and the Future of Ripple XRP Many analysts offer a varied XRP forecast , but a common thread is the recognition of its strong underlying technology and utility. While some remain cautious due to past legal hurdles, others are highly optimistic, citing Ripple’s strategic partnerships and focus on real-world financial solutions. The consensus among many experts is that XRP’s future is closely tied to its adoption by financial institutions and its ability to solve real-world problems more efficiently than existing solutions. The increasing interest in CBDCs and stablecoins could also indirectly benefit XRP, as Ripple is a key player in this evolving landscape. Investment Considerations and Risks: A Balanced XRP Forecast While the potential for XRP is compelling, it is crucial to approach any investment with a clear understanding of the risks involved. Cryptocurrencies are highly volatile assets, and XRP is no exception. Key Risks to Consider: Market Volatility: Prices can fluctuate wildly in short periods. Regulatory Changes: Despite recent clarity, future regulatory actions in different jurisdictions could impact XRP. Competition: Other blockchain networks and traditional financial giants are also vying for dominance in the payment space. Technology Risks: While robust, no technology is immune to unforeseen issues or obsolescence. Liquidity: While generally liquid, market conditions can affect ease of buying and selling. Investors should conduct thorough research, understand their risk tolerance, and consider diversifying their portfolios. Never invest more than you can afford to lose. Actionable Insights for XRP Holders and Potential Investors For those considering an investment in XRP or already holding it, here are some actionable insights: Stay Informed: Keep abreast of legal developments, Ripple’s partnerships, and broader market trends. Follow reputable crypto news sources and official Ripple announcements. Risk Management: Implement a clear investment strategy. This might include dollar-cost averaging, setting stop-loss orders, or taking profits at predetermined levels. Understand the Technology: A deeper understanding of the XRP Ledger and RippleNet’s utility can provide conviction during volatile periods. Long-Term Vision: XRP’s potential often lies in its long-term utility rather than short-term speculative gains. Consider a long-term investment horizon if you believe in its fundamental value. FAQs About Ripple XRP Price Prediction Here are some frequently asked questions regarding XRP price prediction : Q1: What is Ripple XRP? A1: XRP is a digital asset designed for fast, low-cost global payments. It operates on the XRP Ledger , an open-source blockchain, and is used by Ripple , a blockchain technology company, in its payment solutions like RippleNet. Q2: What factors influence the XRP price prediction? A2: Key factors include regulatory clarity (especially regarding the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission lawsuit), market sentiment, Ripple’s partnerships and adoption by financial institutions, technological advancements on the XRPL, and broader macroeconomic conditions. Q3: Is XRP a good investment? A3: Whether XRP is a ‘good’ investment depends on individual risk tolerance, investment goals, and market outlook. It offers potential for growth due to its utility in cross-border payments but also carries significant risks due to market volatility and regulatory uncertainties. Always do your own research. Q4: What are the main challenges for Ripple XRP? A4: Primary challenges for Ripple XRP include ongoing regulatory scrutiny in various jurisdictions, intense competition from other payment networks and digital assets, and the need for broader adoption by traditional financial institutions to fully realize its potential. Q5: When might XRP to $5 become a reality? A5: The timeline for XRP to $5 is speculative. It would likely require a combination of factors: a strong bull market, widespread institutional adoption, complete global regulatory clarity, and significant expansion of Ripple’s payment network. Some analysts suggest it could happen by 2025-2030 under optimal conditions, while others are more cautious. Q6: Where can I get the latest XRP forecast? A6: You can find the latest XRP forecast from reputable cryptocurrency news outlets, market analysis platforms, and financial experts. Always cross-reference information and consider various perspectives. Key figures like Brad Garlinghouse , CEO of Ripple, often provide insights into the company’s direction. Conclusion: The Path Ahead for XRP The journey of Ripple XRP has been nothing short of extraordinary, marked by both innovation and adversity. While the dream of XRP to $5 remains a bold aspiration, it is not without foundation. The asset’s core utility in solving real-world payment problems, coupled with Ripple’s relentless pursuit of partnerships and regulatory clarity, paints a compelling picture for its future. The coming years will be pivotal. As the global financial landscape continues to embrace digital assets, XRP stands at a unique crossroads. Its ability to navigate regulatory complexities, expand its ecosystem, and deliver on its promise of efficient global payments will ultimately determine its long-term value. Investors must remain vigilant, informed, and prepared for the inherent volatility of the crypto market, but the potential for XRP to reshape finance continues to make it a fascinating asset to watch. To learn more about the latest crypto markets trends, explore our article on key developments shaping digital assets liquidity. title: Dogecoin Enters The Big Leagues — Stadium And Jerseys Get A Crypto Makeover
body: According to company releases and club statements, House of Doge and Brag House Holdings, Inc. have taken a major step into Italian football by becoming the largest equity holder in US Triestina Calcio 1918. Related Reading: Dogecoin Down 20% – But Some Think This Is When The Real Gains Start The move was first made public on October 20, 2025, when both firms announced the equity position and pledged immediate capital support for the club. Triestina, which was founded in 1918 and currently competes in Serie C, will carry Dogecoin branding on its match kits and around its stadium for the remainder of the 2025/26 season and all of the 2026/27 campaign. Kit And Stadium Branding Confirmed Based on reports released on October 30, 2025, Dogecoin will appear as the primary sponsor on the front of Triestina’s official match shirts. House of Doge branding is set for secondary placements, such as sleeves and shorts. LED boards inside the ground, big-screen videos and press backdrops will also display the Dogecoin motif during games and media events. These activations are part of a wider plan that includes testing Dogecoin as a payment option for tickets, merchandise and concessions. What The Announcements Leave Out The deal’s exact financial terms were not disclosed. No price tag or ownership percentage was published by either side. Reports have disclosed that a board reconstitution and the appointment of a new president are planned, but names and dates have not been shared. Push For Real-World Use Of Dogecoin House of Doge framed the investment as a chance to push Dogecoin beyond online chatter and into everyday use at a sports venue. The group said the club will act as a platform for broader community initiatives and commercial experiments with crypto payments. Fans could be given new ways to pay and buy, if pilot projects roll out as described. There is, however, a question about how smoothly such systems will be adopted in a lower-division club environment and what regulatory checks will be required in Italy. Marco Margiotta, CEO of House of Doge, said placing the Dogecoin logo front-and-center on the club’s jersey means it will show up in every match photo and TV shot. He said frequent exposure will make people recognize the brand, and that recognition can lead to practical uses and wider global acceptance. Related Reading: Bitcoin Drop Shaves $5 Billion From Satoshi Nakamoto’s Untouched Fortune Local Reaction And Broader Implications Some local journalists praised the capital boost, noting that lower-division clubs often face tight budgets. Others warned that visibility for a cryptocurrency brand does not guarantee long-term financial stability. Market observers will be watching whether the partnership drives measurable increases in matchday revenue or merchandise sales. Community groups, who are central to the club’s identity in Trieste, have been cited as needing reassurance that traditions will be respected. DOGE Price Update Meanwhile, after sliding about 7% in the past 24 hours, DOGE is trading at $0.18. The coin is up 11% so far this year, but that still leaves it roughly 70% below its 2021 peak of $0.73. Featured image from Unsplash, chart from TradingView

title: US Democrats Propose Anti-Cryptocurrency Bill – Here Are the Details
body: Democrat Ro Khanna, a member of the US House of Representatives, has introduced a draft resolution proposing a comprehensive bill aimed at preventing politicians and public officials from engaging in crypto assets. Khanna explained his proposal by saying, “No one should hold an elected office to profit from their position.” Khanna's proposed draft resolution states that the president, vice president, members of Congress, elected public officials, and their immediate family members should not issue, support, or endorse any digital assets, including cryptocurrencies, memecoins, stablecoins, NFTs, digital trading cards, and DeFi platforms. It also argues that elected officials and candidates should be required to transfer their digital assets into inaccessible “blind trusts” during their term and for two years after leaving office. The bill also seeks to support legislation that would require politicians and their families to provide timely and complete disclosure of all cryptocurrency transactions. Khanna's proposal directly targets the digital asset activities of US President Donald Trump and his family. The draft alleges that the Trump family “has used their names and likenesses to establish an opaque and largely unregulated network of crypto ventures.” The document states that these projects include tools such as digital trading cards, memecoins, stablecoins, and DeFi platforms. Related News: Tron Founder Justin Sun's Net Worth Revealed According to the text of the decision, Trump “used his influence to increase the value of his own crypto ventures by using his authority and access.” It also alleges that foreign investments have flowed into Trump-linked crypto projects. The bill also criticizes Trump's recent presidential pardon of Binance founder and former CEO Changpeng Zhao. The White House, in a statement, said Trump was “exercising his constitutional authority” and accused the Biden administration of waging an “anti-crypto war.” “The Biden administration attempted to sentence Zhao to three years in prison despite the absence of any allegations of fraud or victims. This extreme approach has damaged the image of the United States as a global leader in technology and innovation,” White House spokeswoman Karoline Leavitt said. Khanna's bill appears unlikely to pass because Republicans hold the majority in the House. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: US Democrats Propose Anti-Cryptocurrency Bill – Here Are the Details

title: XRP Chart Shows Perfect Cup and Handle Pattern, Analyst Sets Next Price Target
body: The cryptocurrency market thrives on powerful technical patterns. When such a setup appears on a major asset, traders take notice. XRP’s monthly chart is now displaying one of those rare, textbook signals that could define its next major rally phase. A Classic Pattern Takes Shape A classic cup-and-handle pattern has formed on the monthly XRP/USD chart for Bitstamp, signaling a potential bullish breakout. This bullish continuation pattern began forming after XRP’s late-2024 lows. Over the following months, the price gradually curved upward, completing the “cup.” Since mid-2025, XRP has been consolidating in a tight range around $2.50, forming the “handle.” This pattern indicates that XRP is building momentum ahead of its next potential price surge. The structure reflects a market transitioning from long-term accumulation to renewed buying pressure. #XRP monthly chart showing perfect cup and handle pattern. Next price target is above $5. pic.twitter.com/y9v3bhBWmN — CryptoBull (@CryptoBull2020) October 31, 2025 CryptoBull Highlights the Bullish Setup Prominent X analyst CryptoBull recently shared this observation, posting the XRP monthly chart and confirming the classic formation. The chart highlights how XRP has maintained its bullish trajectory since 2024, despite market volatility. According to CryptoBull, the handle formation is nearing completion, positioning XRP for a significant breakout. If the pattern confirms, the measured move projects the next price target above $5, signaling the potential start of a multi-month uptrend. Why the Cup and Handle Matters A cup and handle pattern on a monthly timeframe carries serious implications. It often represents extended accumulation and renewed market confidence. The rounded cup shows where sellers have gradually exhausted, while the handle signals short-term consolidation before a potential surge. When confirmed, this formation often triggers long-term continuation rallies. In XRP’s case, a decisive monthly close above the handle’s resistance could mark the beginning of a new bull phase. Technical analysts suggest that sustained volume growth would validate the breakout. Market Context and Momentum XRP’s fundamental backdrop aligns with its technical outlook. Ripple’s expanding global partnerships and the growing use of the XRP Ledger for stablecoin and tokenized asset transactions are strengthening the asset’s ecosystem. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Institutional participation is also increasing, following the regulatory clarity achieved earlier this year. This combination of strong fundamentals and a well-structured chart pattern gives the bullish thesis additional weight. What Traders Should Watch For confirmation, traders are watching for a monthly close above $2.80 with strong trading volume. If this occurs, technical projections point toward a breakout that could extend beyond $5. However, a failed breakout could send XRP back toward the $2.00 handle support zone. Analysts recommend closely monitoring both price action and market sentiment as the formation nears completion. Outlook CryptoBull’s post has reignited interest in XRP’s long-term structure. The chart’s alignment with a textbook bullish pattern has strengthened investor optimism. If the setup confirms, XRP could soon begin a new rally phase targeting levels unseen since 2021. For now, XRP remains one of the most technically compelling digital assets on the market — and all eyes are on the monthly close. In conclusion, Edgen’s multi-AI agent intelligence platform offers a truly revolutionary approach to integrated stock and crypto insights. title: Tragic End: Thodex Founder Faruk Fatih Özer Dies in Prison After $2 Billion Crypto Fraud
body: BitcoinWorld Tragic End: Thodex Founder Faruk Fatih Özer Dies in Prison After $2 Billion Crypto Fraud The cryptocurrency world often brings tales of innovation and immense wealth, but it also carries stories of caution and devastating loss. One such saga reached its dramatic conclusion with the reported death of Thodex founder , Faruk Fatih Özer, in prison. This news, reported by Wu Blockchain citing Bloomberg, marks the final chapter for a figure who became infamous for one of the largest crypto frauds in history. The Tragic End of the Thodex Founder’s Journey Faruk Fatih Özer, the man behind the defunct Turkish cryptocurrency exchange Thodex, has reportedly passed away while incarcerated. His death closes a chapter on a case that captivated the global financial community and left hundreds of thousands of investors reeling. Özer was serving an astounding sentence of 11,196 years in prison. He also faced a substantial fine of $5 million. These penalties stemmed from charges of failing to return an estimated $2 billion in deposits. The fraud impacted approximately 400,000 customers who entrusted their funds to Thodex. The scale of the misappropriation was staggering, highlighting the immense risks within the unregulated corners of the crypto market. The Thodex founder ‘s fate serves as a stark reminder of the severe consequences awaiting those who betray investor trust. What Exactly Was the Thodex Crypto Fraud? Thodex was once a prominent cryptocurrency exchange based in Turkey. However, in April 2021, the platform abruptly ceased operations, locking users out of their accounts and sparking widespread panic. Faruk Fatih Özer, the exchange’s CEO, vanished shortly after, leading to accusations of a massive exit scam, commonly known as a ‘rug pull’. Investigators later revealed that Özer had allegedly fled Turkey with the stolen funds, leaving behind a trail of devastated investors. His disappearance triggered an international manhunt, culminating in his capture in Albania in August 2022. He was subsequently extradited back to Turkey to face justice. The sheer volume of funds involved, estimated at $2 billion, made the Thodex fraud one of the most significant cryptocurrency scams to date. It exposed critical vulnerabilities in centralized crypto exchanges and the urgent need for greater regulatory oversight. Critical Lessons from the Thodex Founder’s Downfall The saga of the Thodex founder offers invaluable lessons for both investors and the broader cryptocurrency industry. It underscores the importance of due diligence and the inherent risks associated with less regulated platforms. Here are key takeaways: Investor Vigilance: Always research an exchange thoroughly. Check its reputation, security measures, and regulatory compliance before depositing significant funds. Regulatory Gaps: The incident highlighted the need for clearer and more robust regulatory frameworks globally to protect consumers in the rapidly evolving crypto space. Decentralization’s Appeal: It reinforced the argument for decentralized finance (DeFi) solutions, which aim to reduce reliance on single points of failure and central authorities. Cold Storage: For long-term holdings, consider using hardware wallets (cold storage) to maintain direct control over your assets, rather than leaving them on an exchange. The devastating impact on 400,000 customers underscores the human cost of such large-scale financial crimes. The fall of the Thodex founder is a cautionary tale that resonates deeply within the crypto community. Broader Implications for Cryptocurrency Trust High-profile cases like the Thodex fraud inevitably erode public trust in the cryptocurrency ecosystem. They fuel skepticism and can deter mainstream adoption, despite the innovative potential of blockchain technology. Such incidents often lead to: Increased calls for stricter government oversight. Greater scrutiny from traditional financial institutions. A push for exchanges to implement more transparent proof-of-reserves mechanisms. While the industry continues to mature, the legacy of events like the Thodex collapse serves as a powerful reminder that security and accountability must remain paramount. For the crypto space to thrive, it must consistently demonstrate its commitment to protecting users and upholding ethical standards. The death of the Thodex founder brings a definitive end to a story that served as a stark warning about the darker side of the digital asset boom. It reinforces the critical need for vigilance, strong regulation, and robust security practices to safeguard the future of cryptocurrency for all participants. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Who was Faruk Fatih Özer? Faruk Fatih Özer was the founder and CEO of Thodex, a Turkish cryptocurrency exchange that collapsed in April 2021 amid allegations of a massive exit scam. What was Thodex? Thodex was a centralized cryptocurrency exchange based in Turkey. It allowed users to buy, sell, and trade various digital assets before it abruptly halted operations, leading to a large-scale fraud. How much money was involved in the Thodex fraud? The Thodex fraud involved the misappropriation of approximately $2 billion in client funds, affecting around 400,000 customers. What sentence did the Thodex founder receive? Faruk Fatih Özer was sentenced to an extraordinary 11,196 years in prison and fined $5 million for his role in the fraud. What does this mean for crypto security? The Thodex case highlights the critical importance of robust security, regulatory oversight, and due diligence when choosing cryptocurrency exchanges. It underscores the risks associated with centralized platforms. Are the victims’ funds recovered? While investigations and legal proceedings were ongoing, the majority of the $2 billion in misappropriated funds from the Thodex fraud were not recovered and returned to the victims. Did you find this article insightful? Share it with your friends and on social media to spread awareness about the importance of security in the crypto world! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping cryptocurrency security and institutional adoption. This post Tragic End: Thodex Founder Faruk Fatih Özer Dies in Prison After $2 Billion Crypto Fraud first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: This New Crypto Priced Under $0.04 Might Change Your Cryptocurrency Portfolio Forever
body: Every bull market brings a few breakout tokens that redefine early-stage investing in crypto. Analysts believe one of the next big movers could already be here and it’s still priced below $0.04. As attention shifts from meme coins and stagnant layer-1s to functional DeFi projects, investors are increasingly turning to Mutuum Finance (MUTM) , a new decentralized lending protocol that’s quietly raising millions before its launch. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is a DeFi protocol that streamlines the process of decentralized lending, where the smart contracts are used to govern a borrower-lender relationship. The protocol is designed to use the automated contracts to automate the process of transactions, compute interest and manage collateral in a way it does not use centralized intermediaries. The aim is to ensure that crypto lending is safer, more transparent and more rewarding. The platform has two complementary markets. The former is the Peer-to-Contract (P2C) market. Users put in ETH or USDT in liquidity pools and earn mtTokens. The second market is Peer-to-peer (P2P) marketplace. Direct lending is arranged between the users of less popular assets. Individual interest rates and terms are established and every loan has Loan-to-Value (LTV) ratio which provides adequate security. Presale Momentum Mutuum Finance is at the Phase 6 of its presale. Each MUTM token is priced at $0.035. The next price will be increased by nearly 20% to $0.04 and the launch price is set at $0.06. MUTM may be appreciated by 500% for investors that joined Phase 1 at official listing. Having raised more than $18.2 million and sold over 785 million tokens, the project currently has over 17,600 holders. The close launch date and the growth of demand have led to sales acceleration in this stage. Mutuum Finance has implemented a 24-hours leaderboard. The most active participant gets $500 in MUTM tokens per day. This fosters competition, ensures that there is a lot of investor activity and that there is transparency during the presale. The other innovation is that investors can purchase MUTM using a card with no restrictions thus the presale is open to both beginners and those who have been using it for a long time. In DeFi, trust is everything, and that is what Mutuum Finance has earned. The protocol went through a CertiK audit with the high score of 90/100 Token Scan Score, which implies well-structured and safe smart contracts. The team also runs a $50,000 bug-bounty to discover code vulnerabilities before the launch of the mainnet. These are steps that demonstrate a concern of safety and transparency, a factor that creates trust between early-stage investors. V1 Launch on Sepolia Testnet One of the main milestones is the launch of V1 to the Sepolia Testnet in Q4 in 2025, which will be the shift between development and live testing. Introducing deposits or lending of assets in a Liquidity Pool is the major characteristic of V1, as well as the use of mtTokens to document deposits and collect automatic interest and Debt Tokens that reflect obligations of borrowers. There will be a Liquidator Bot that will discover and resolve the under-collateralized positions in order to keep the platform stable. The testnet will first include lending, borrowing, and collateral of ETH and USDT. Other cryptocurrencies and stablecoins will be incorporated with intense testing. These releases of products are supposed to increase investor confidence more so when accompanied by presale participation and milestone delivery. The Reason Investors are Watching Closely Many industry analysts perceive MUTM to have a bright future. Beginning with a price of $0.06 at launch, it has the potential of increasing to $0.40. Other experts draw parallels between Mutuum Finance and early Aave or Solana, which started their projects as small DeFi projects before eventually evolving into large-cap hits. title: Unleash Exciting Opportunities: OKX Lists LAB Perpetual Futures
body: BitcoinWorld Unleash Exciting Opportunities: OKX Lists LAB Perpetual Futures Get ready, crypto enthusiasts! A significant development is unfolding in the world of derivatives trading. OKX, a leading global cryptocurrency exchange, has just made an exciting announcement that is set to capture the attention of traders worldwide: the listing of LAB perpetual futures . This new offering opens up a fresh avenue for those looking to engage with the market in a dynamic way, bringing with it the potential for enhanced trading strategies. What Are LAB Perpetual Futures and Why Are They Exciting? Curious about what LAB perpetual futures entail? Simply put, perpetual futures are a type of derivative contract that allows traders to speculate on the future price of an asset without an expiration date, unlike traditional futures. This means you can hold your position for as long as you wish, as long as you meet margin requirements. The ‘LAB’ component refers to a specific project token, and trading its perpetual futures allows you to gain exposure to its price movements. What makes this particular listing by OKX so compelling is the substantial leverage offered – up to 50x. This level of leverage can significantly amplify potential gains, transforming even small price movements into substantial profits. However, it is crucial to remember that leverage is a double-edged sword, also magnifying potential losses. Understanding the underlying asset and the mechanics of perpetual futures is key to navigating this powerful tool effectively. Navigating the World of OKX LAB Perpetual Futures: What You Need to Know The official launch for LAB perpetual futures on OKX is scheduled for today, at 12:00 p.m. UTC. This precise timing means traders need to be prepared and understand the immediate implications of this listing. For many, this represents a fresh opportunity to diversify their trading portfolio and capitalize on the volatility inherent in new listings. Trading these futures contracts on OKX comes with several benefits. You can go long (bet on price increase) or short (bet on price decrease), providing flexibility regardless of market direction. The high leverage, while risky, offers the chance for significant capital efficiency. However, it’s vital to approach this with a robust risk management strategy. Always consider setting stop-loss orders to limit potential downsides and never invest more than you can afford to lose, especially with 50x leverage. How Can Traders Prepare for LAB Perpetual Futures Trading? To effectively participate in LAB perpetual futures trading, preparation is paramount. First, conduct thorough research on the LAB token itself. Understand its project, use cases, and market sentiment. Knowledge is your strongest asset in predicting potential price movements. Familiarize yourself with OKX’s trading interface and its specific tools for futures trading, such as margin requirements and liquidation protocols. Consider starting with smaller position sizes if you are new to high-leverage trading. OKX provides various resources and guides that can help you understand the intricacies of perpetual futures. Developing a clear trading plan, including entry and exit points, and sticking to it, can significantly improve your chances of success while managing the inherent risks. Remember, disciplined trading is profitable trading. The introduction of LAB perpetual futures on OKX marks an exciting milestone for the platform and its users. With up to 50x leverage, it presents a compelling opportunity for experienced traders to potentially amplify their returns. However, the power of leverage demands respect and a well-thought-out strategy. By understanding the mechanics, managing risks diligently, and staying informed, traders can confidently explore the potential this new listing offers. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What are LAB perpetual futures? LAB perpetual futures are derivative contracts that allow traders to speculate on the price of the LAB token without an expiration date, offering continuous trading opportunities. When will OKX list LAB perpetual futures? OKX announced it will list LAB perpetual futures today, at 12:00 p.m. UTC. What is the maximum leverage offered for LAB perpetual futures on OKX? OKX is offering up to 50x leverage for LAB perpetual futures. What are the risks associated with trading perpetual futures with high leverage? title: Analyst Predicts Shiba Inu Prcie Will Rally 608%, Here’s When
body: Although Shiba Inu has remained the second-largest meme coin by market cap , its price performance in recent times has left much to be desired. The meme coin has failed to put in a new all-time high this cycle, with the price down more than 88% from its all-time high levels from 2021. However, even this underperformance has not eroded the bullish sentiment surrounding the token, as one analyst has predicted that the Shiba Inu price still has more to offer. Consolidation Will End, And Shiba Inu Price Will Surge Over the last few months, the Shiba Inu price has fallen into a consolidation trend that has waxed stronger with the uncertain market headwinds. This has seen the price trade in a very tight range during this time, holding between $0.000009 and $0.000013 without any significant breakout in sight. Like with any consolidation trend, this time has been seen as a good time to get into the meme coin and begin buying at a discount . However, this is also entirely dependent on how long the consolidation is expected to last before there is a breakout, which would determine if accumulation was a good choice or not. According to crypto analyst MMBTtrader, this current consolidation may be presenting a good opportunity for entry. So far, the Shiba Inu price has seen a persistent dominance of low volatility, and the momentum has remained muted. Historically, during times of quiet like these, the best entries and trades are made. Furthermore, the crypto analyst pointed out that the Shiba Inu consolidation and accumulation phase may actually be nearing its end. Right now, the only thing left would be a catalyst that would trigger the next wave of the uptrend. This could be in the form of bullish news or a technical push . Either way, the outcome is expected to be the same. Shooting For New Yearly Highs In the case of a breakout, the crypto analyst expects the Shiba Inu price to see a notable and sharp rise . Multiple targets are set out for the meme coin, but all with triple-digit ascents. The first of these is a 200% breakout to the $0.00003364 level. Next on the list is a 402% price increase that would push the Shiba Inu price as high as $0.00005480 . While the final target is a 608% increase to push it above the $0.000075 level. While none of these puts it above its previous all-time high levels, it does send it quite close. As for the timeframe for this breakout to be completed, the crypto analyst puts it between 2026 and 2027, so over a year before completion.

title: Nobitex Raises the Bar for Trust and Transparency in Crypto
body: A New Benchmark for Responsible Crypto in Challenging Markets As global regulators tighten oversight and crypto exchanges face growing scrutiny, Nobitex , Iran’s largest cryptocurrency exchange with over ten million verified users, has emerged as a regional leader in transparency, compliance, and user protection. Operating under Iran’s restricted financial system — shaped by years of international sanctions — Nobitex has demonstrated that trust and responsibility can thrive even in complex environments. Following a high-profile cyberattack in June 2025 , the company’s open communication, full compensation for affected users, and rapid recovery positioned it as a model of responsible crypto governance in the Middle East. Transparency as Practice — Not Promise Nobitex has transformed transparency from a slogan into a measurable practice. After the 2025 incident, the exchange adopted a proactive disclosure model: publishing frequent recovery updates, sharing timelines, and maintaining open communication with users. Key Transparency Measures: •Regular public updates during incident response and recovery •Voluntary transparency dashboards showing KYC verification rates, flagged activities, and support response times •Clear statements confirming that Nobitex does not use mixers or transaction obfuscation tools This commitment has strengthened user confidence and positioned Nobitex as a rare model of crypto accountability in sanctioned markets. Compliance and Technology: AI-Driven AML/KYC Nobitex’s compliance framework is built around AI-powered transaction monitoring and on-chain analytics aligned with global AML (Anti-Money Laundering) and KYC (Know Your Customer) standards. Every transaction is traceable and auditable — ensuring legitimate activity and minimizing exposure to illicit use. For Users, This Means: •Secure access for users navigating inflation and financial restrictions •Continuous on-chain monitoring to reduce exposure to sanctioned entities •Faster, more reliable customer support based on verified user identity By combining automation, transparency, and education, Nobitex balances compliance, privacy, and accessibility. Empowering Iranians Through Investment Access While global narratives often focus on sanctions and politics, Nobitex’s impact is fundamentally economic and personal. The platform primarily serves ordinary Iranian users , offering a secure digital environment for investment and asset preservation amid inflation and currency volatility. Platform Highlights: •Verified KYC onboarding and multilingual educational programs •Real-time support to help users manage assets securely •Transparent investment opportunities that comply with local regulations and help users protect the long-term value of their savings For many Iranians, Nobitex provides a responsible investment gateway enabling participation in digital finance while staying compliant with domestic laws. Innovation Under Sanctions Operating within Iran’s sanctioned economy means navigating a complex balance between compliance, technology, and user protection. Nobitex’s approach ensures that sanctions targeting Iran do not compromise the platform’s technical integrity or users’ rights. Nobitex itself is not subject to international sanctions and operates under strict internal policies that safeguard privacy and legal compliance. This dual reality — global restrictions on Iran and Nobitex’s pursuit of lawful innovation — has driven the company to build resilient systems and transparent governance models that preserve user trust. Global Lessons from Nobitex’s Model Nobitex’s experience offers valuable insights for crypto exchanges operating in constrained or emerging markets: • Accountability builds resilience : Transparent communication and fair compensation strengthen long-term trust. • Metrics enhance oversight: Open dashboards and KPIs support credibility with users and regulators. • Compliance and privacy can coexist: AI-driven tools enable AML/KYC enforcement while protecting user data. Through its focus on transparency, compliance, and user education, Nobitex is redefining responsible crypto operations under economic pressure. About Nobitex Founded in 2018, Nobitex is the largest cryptocurrency exchange in Iran, serving millions across the MENA region. The platform emphasizes secure, compliant, and transparent access to digital investment , publishing public reports on verification, monitoring, and customer support performance. With a long-term vision for ethical innovation and user trust, Nobitex continues to set the benchmark for transparency and resilience in the Middle East’s digital economy. title: Crypto Hacking Losses Plummet: A Remarkable 85.7% Drop in October
body: BitcoinWorld Crypto Hacking Losses Plummet: A Remarkable 85.7% Drop in October In a significant win for digital asset security, crypto hacking losses witnessed a dramatic 85.7% decline in October, plummeting to just $18.18 million. This remarkable reduction from the previous month’s $127 million in losses, as reported by blockchain security firm PeckShield, signals a positive shift in the ongoing battle against cyber threats in the cryptocurrency space. What’s Behind the Sharp Decline in Crypto Hacking Losses ? The substantial drop in crypto hacking losses isn’t merely a stroke of luck; it reflects a concerted effort by security firms, project developers, and the wider crypto community. Several factors likely contributed to this encouraging trend: Enhanced Security Measures: Blockchain projects are increasingly investing in robust security audits, bug bounty programs, and multi-layered authentication protocols. Proactive Threat Intelligence: Firms like PeckShield provide crucial real-time monitoring and analysis, allowing for quicker identification and mitigation of potential vulnerabilities. Improved User Awareness: A more informed user base is less susceptible to phishing scams and social engineering attacks, which often precede larger hacks. Law Enforcement Collaboration: Increased cooperation between blockchain analytics companies and global law enforcement agencies is making it harder for cybercriminals to launder stolen funds, thus reducing the incentive for hacks. October’s Notable Incidents: A Closer Look at Crypto Hacking Losses While the overall figures are positive, it’s important to understand the nature of the crypto hacking losses that did occur in October. Unlike previous months which saw large-scale DeFi protocol exploits, October’s incidents were generally smaller in scale. This suggests a shift in the attack landscape, with hackers perhaps targeting less secure, smaller projects or individual wallets. PeckShield’s data highlights that the total $18.18 million was spread across various minor incidents, rather than dominated by one or two major breaches. This indicates that while vigilance remains paramount, the industry is becoming more resilient against catastrophic single points of failure. The focus on smaller targets underscores the need for continuous security improvements across all levels of the crypto ecosystem, from individual users to emerging protocols. Maintaining Momentum: What’s Next for Reducing Crypto Hacking Losses ? The significant drop in crypto hacking losses in October is certainly cause for optimism, but the fight for digital asset security is far from over. Maintaining this positive momentum requires ongoing commitment and innovation. Here are key areas where the industry must continue to focus: Continuous Audits: Regular and thorough security audits remain non-negotiable for all blockchain projects, especially those handling substantial user funds. Education and Awareness: User education on best practices for wallet security, identifying scams, and understanding transaction risks is crucial. Decentralized Security Solutions: Exploring and implementing decentralized security protocols and community-driven monitoring systems can add additional layers of protection. Rapid Incident Response: Developing swift and effective incident response plans is vital to minimize damage when a breach does occur. October’s dramatic reduction in crypto hacking losses to $18.18 million marks a pivotal moment for the industry. It showcases the tangible results of enhanced security measures, proactive intelligence, and collective efforts. While challenges persist, this positive trend reinforces the potential for a more secure and trustworthy digital asset ecosystem. The journey towards absolute security is ongoing, but October’s figures provide a powerful testament to progress. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: How much did crypto hacking losses fall in October? Crypto hacking losses fell by a remarkable 85.7% in October, totaling $18.18 million. Q2: Who reported these figures on crypto hacking losses? The figures were reported by PeckShield, a leading blockchain security firm. Q3: What factors contributed to the decrease in crypto hacking losses? Several factors contributed, including enhanced security measures, proactive threat intelligence, improved user awareness, and increased law enforcement collaboration. Q4: Were there any major crypto hacking losses in October? Unlike previous months, October did not see any major, large-scale hacks. The reported $18.18 million was spread across numerous smaller incidents. Q5: What can users do to protect their crypto assets from hacking losses? Users can protect their assets by using strong, unique passwords, enabling two-factor authentication (2FA), being wary of phishing scams, and educating themselves on secure wallet practices. Q6: Does this mean the crypto space is now completely safe from hacking losses? While October’s figures are very positive, the crypto space is not entirely safe. Continuous vigilance, ongoing security improvements, and user education remain crucial to mitigate future crypto hacking losses . We hope this analysis of the recent decline in crypto hacking losses has been insightful. If you found this article informative, please share it with your network on social media to help spread awareness about the evolving landscape of blockchain security. Your support helps us continue to deliver valuable insights into the world of cryptocurrencies. title: T3 Financial Crime Unit reports $300 million in frozen assets connected to illegal activities
body: The T3 Financial Crime Unit (T3 FCU), a public-private task force backed by the stablecoin issuer Tether Limited, reported freezing illegal funds worth $300 million during its first year of operation. Following this move, international law enforcement acknowledged that the task force had done its job well. Additionally, the achievement demonstrates that the stablecoin industry can effectively self-regulate. According to TRON founder Justin Sun, the T3 Financial Crime Unit’s $300 million milestone is proof that progress happens when technology, institutions, and people work as a team. He noted that by building trust and cooperation across borders, it is possible to make the digital economy safer and more accessible for everyone. The T3 Financial Crime Unit focuses on various illegal financial activities Regarding the T3 Financial Crime Unit’s accomplishment , sources revealed that the task force achieved this milestone after working directly with law enforcement in 23 areas, including a crucial role in Brazil’s major Operation Lusocoin. When reporters reached out to Tether for further information, the company stated that the unit focuses on various illegal finance activities such as state-sponsored hacks, violent “wrench attacks,” and organized crime groups. To support this claim, reports revealed that the unit in Brazil assisted in Operation Lusocoin, resulting in the freezing of more than R$3 billion in assets. This marked one of the most significant recent confiscations, including 4.3 million USDT connected to a criminal organization. The report also highlighted the predominance of stablecoins in major currency evasion and money laundering cases . After careful consideration, Tether noted that the US had been ranked as the most active jurisdiction globally, with $83 million in frozen assets across 37 cases, followed by significant operations in Europe and South America. The discovery outlines the existence of a diverse and challenging threat environment. On the other hand, recent reports have highlighted that the most common crime scrutinized involved the illegal sale of goods and services. It accounted for around 39% of the task force’s workload. High-profile hacks, fraud, and scams were also uncovered in this investigation. An example is a single seizure of about $19 million linked to North Korea’s involvement in the Bybit hack. To address these issues, Tether and its partners have vowed to maintain a strong partnership with agencies worldwide, including Europol. At the same time, they continue to investigate major criminal activities like financing terrorism, extortion schemes, money laundering, and investment fraud. T3 FCU launches the T3+ Global Collaborator Program To expand its footprint in the crypto ecosystem, the T3+ Global Collaborator Program launched in August, and Binance became its first significant member. T3+ will serve as a “public-private” uniting between industry actors and law enforcement agencies worldwide . The ultimate goal is to expedite cross-border investigations and enhance monitoring capabilities by collaborating closely with exchanges, financial institutions, and other key stakeholders. Nils Andersen-Röed, Global Head of the Financial Intelligence Unit at Binance, called the effort “proactive collaboration.” Following its launch, concerns were raised about the program’s impact. This was addressed at Vienna’s 9th Global Conference on Criminal Finances and Cryptocurrencies. Europol and the Basel Institute on Governance co-hosted the event During this event, prominent executives from leading companies, including TRON DAO, Tether , Binance, and TRM Labs, met with Europol officials to discuss how the T3 framework can serve as a guide for future public-private collaborations.
